title: The New tax system : 'How to' series
brief_description: This video contains the four videos in the “How to” series that have been produced by the Australian Taxation Office to assist with the implementation of the new Goods and Services Tax. It contains information about who should register and how too register for an ABN, the new Business Activity Statement, the requirements and importance of good record keeping and the Pay As You Go system. Presented by Michael Caton.
